combat1.name: Normal Attack: Dance on Fire
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby enemies.
At end of sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Sweeping Fervor
combat2.info:
Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing Pyro DMG on nearby enemies, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Xinyan's DEF and on the number of enemies hit.
- Hitting 0-1 enemies grants Shield Level 1: Ad Lib.
- Hitting 2 enemies grants Shield Level 2: Lead-In.
- Hitting 3 or more enemies grants Shield Level 3: Rave, which will also deal intermittent Pyro DMG to nearby enemies.

The shield has the following special properties:
- When unleashed, it infuses Xinyan with Pyro.
- It has a 250% DMG Absorption effectiveness against Pyro DMG.
combat2.description: Xinyan insists that these pyrotechnics are the apex of performative art, and that they are physical phenomena that have nothing to do with her Vision.

combat3.name: Riff Revolution
combat3.info: Strumming rapidly, Xinyan launches nearby enemies and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd. The sheer intensity of the atmosphere will cause explosions that deal Pyro DMG to nearby enemies.
combat3.description: Xinyan used to end all her performances with this move. She didn't stop because it was dangerous, however, but because she didn't have a more epic finale in case someone shouted "Encore!"

passive1.name: "The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."
passive1.info:
Decreases the number of enemies Sweeping Fervor must hit to trigger each level of shielding.
- Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 enemy hit.
- Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 enemies hit or more.

passive2.name: "...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"
passive2.info: Characters shielded by Sweeping Fervor deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

passive3.name: A Rad Recipe
passive3.info: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on an DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
